title: Client Keeps crashing mid game and freezing my entire machine
body: Every other game im playing, usually totally randomly, my game freezes, my keyboard and mouse become unresponsive, and i have to hard reset my machine to get it back. no amount of time waiting does it recover. This only happens when im playing league of legends

Every single game I would spawn in and my computer would just freeze and I would have to restart it and try and join back before a remake. The solution I found was playing in windowed mode. Had the same issue not long ago,managed to somehow fix and it hasn't happened today(even tho I was playing for over half of the day )
Tho,I had lag spikes,frequent disconnects and freezing issue.

STEPS
1) Delete/Uninstall all programs you aren't using,but might pop up during your game (anti-virus programs which can be put on silent mode or disabled briefly).

2) I followed this video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OxC9KlO6CWk 
Skip the first and third part,but do the second and fourth 

3) I have NVIDIA Control Panel set it to full  Performance .(Don't know how much it helps,since I nearly always close this program )

4) Open the Client and Launch a full repair


After all that,you should scan your computer for  Viruses or any other activity which may harm,before you log in make sure that Close client when playing-box is ticked and Low spec mode enabled. 
If you're playing on wire-less,try if all the cables your rooter are properly plugged in.
Lastly(if possible) a laptop cooling pad can do wonders.


I'm not an expert,but I went through these steps and it seems the issue has been resolved. Hope it helps anyone. Good luck
